headline.main: Review: The New York Philharmonic Plays a Piece Inspired by Night
headline.print_headline: The Goddess of Night Is Also a Muse

lead_paragraph: Breaking months of public silence, former Baylor coach Art Briles said Thursday he could no longer "remain silent" and insisted he did not cover up sexual violence by his players or try to obstruct any investigations tied to the assault scandal at the nation's largest Baptist university.
